original: MARTINIUS, Josef E J, Direktör, Göteborg, f Gbg 27/12 96 av dir Martin o Sofie Johansson, gm Tyra Hansson. Stud o prakt i Tyskl 0 Engl. Dir o inneh fiskexp.fma AB Martin Johanssons fiskaffär (etabl 89) sed. 27, i styr sed. 18. Styr.ordf i fi Byggnads.frn o Fastigh-AB i Gbg. Ordf Sv Fiskhandelsfrb sed. 35 (v. ordf 26—35), ordf Exportsekt av Fiskgrossist-frn sed. 32, v. ordf Frn för Fiskpropaganda, styr.led Gbgs o Boh läns havsfiskefrn, Hol-termanska stift, Mölndal, direkt.led Göta Col-dinuorden, medl Frimurareorden, Göta Par Bricole. Resor: De fi europ länder, Nordafrika o Orienten.
translated: MARTINIUS, Josef E J, Director, Gothenburg, b. Gothenburg 27/12 96, son of director Martin and Sofie Johansson, m. Tyra Hansson. Studied and practiced in Germany and England. Director and owner of the fish export company AB Martin Johanssons fiskaffär (established in 1889) since 1927, member of the board since 1918. Chairman of the board in the fish building society and real estate company in Gothenburg. Chairman of the Swedish Fish Trade Association since 1935 (vice chairman from 1926 to 1935), chairman of the Fish Wholesalers' Export Section since 1932, vice chairman of the Fish Propaganda Association, board member of the Gothenburg and Bohus County Sea Fishing Association, Holtermanska Foundation, Mölndal, director of the Göta Col-dinuorden, member of the Freemasons' Order, Göta Par Bricole. Travels: to several European countries, North Africa, and the Orient.

memberOf.name: Fish Building Society and Real Estate Company in Gothenburg

career.workplace: Gothenburg and Bohus County Sea Fishing Association
